channel.title: Main class gui(PLEASE PLEASE HELP)
channel.description:
How do i fix this problem when ever i run the run.bat in this client this comes up and the client closes: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ziu25l.png[/img]
Heres my run.bat: [code]@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ START javaw -Xmx1500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
And Gui.java and Gui class file are both in the same directory as run.bat
Please help me.
